info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Stephens, northeastern Habersham, south central Rabun and southwestern Oconee Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Clarkesville, or near Tallulah Falls, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toccoa, Tallulah Falls, Lake Rabun, Tallulah Gorge State Park, Lakemont, Long Creek, Turnerville and Hollywood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
